about_the_game:
Shroud is a 2D action platformer with inspiration from the slower methodical approach of the classic Castlevania games with a mix of the overall formula and expanded vertical movement options of the Super Nintendo Mega Man X games. Every screen is meticulously crafted to make the player strategize around the abundant obstacles, be wary of every corner, and expect the unexpected. With a robust and unique set of enemies for every stage as well as intriguing and fearsome bosses, Shroud is hood to toe filled with surprising encounters and challenges reminiscent of its inspirations.

In this demo build, take on one of the levels of the game, a strange valley full of deformed creatures.

short_description: In an otherworldly twilight born from the petals of a mysterious cosmic flower, a shrouded girl seeks to sever the threads holding it together. In this 2D action platformer, use your ferocity and grace to traverse a variety of unique levels full of methodical encounters and untold new powers.
